entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries beginning in the morning then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
